title: About us
description: We are a team of professionals united by a common goal: to create innovative software solutions that help businesses reach new heights. Our company was founded in 2004 and has since established itself as a reliable partner for clients worldwide.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to provide high-quality software solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients. We strive for continuous improvement and implementation of advanced technologies to ensure maximum efficiency and productivity.

specialists.title: Specialists
specialists.text: Softerio employs highly qualified specialists with extensive experience in various fields, including web development, UX/UI design and digital marketing. Our team strives to create innovative solutions that help clients achieve their business goals and improve project efficiency.

values.title: Values
items: Customer focus: We always put our customers' interests first.
Innovation: We believe in the power of technology and constantly look for new ways to apply it.
Quality: We strive for high quality in everything we do.
